actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To permit the advertising and sale of lottery tickets within certain areas of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Appropriation Act, 1982, as amended by the District of Columbia Appropriations Act, 1990, to repeal the prohibition against, and so permit, the promotion or operation of revenue-raising games of chance on the federal enclave, its adjacent public buildings, and land controlled by the Shipstead-Luce Act.

titles.title: To permit the advertising and sale of lottery tickets within certain areas of the District of Columbia.
